doctext: the political - military command has issued a com ##mun ##ique reporting that three terrorists have died and four were arrested in an armed clash between an army patrol and a terrorist column . the com ##mun ##ique says that a few days ago a group of terrorists clashed with the army in the chi ##l ##hua region , la mar province , a ##ya ##cu ##cho department . some terrorists were detained and put at the disposal of the san miguel police station .
